mapper.insert: insert into POOL_MEMBER (POOLMEM_SEQ, POOL_SEQ, USR_SEQ, APPROVE, APRV_USR) values ( #{poolMemSeq }, #{poolSeq }, #{usrSeq }, #{approve } , #{aprvUsr } )
mapper.select: select POOL_MEMBER.POOLMEM_SEQ as poolMemSeq, POOL_MEMBER.POOL_SEQ as poolSeq, POOL_MEMBER.USR_SEQ as usrSeq, POOL_MEMBER.APPROVE as approve, POOL_MEMBER.CRT_DATE as crtDate, USERS.USR_NICK as usrNick, USERS.USR_PROFILE as profile, USERS.USR_GENDER as gender from POOL_MEMBER, USERS WHERE POOL_MEMBER.USR_SEQ = USERS.USR_SEQ and POOL_MEMBER.USR_SEQ = #{usrSeq }

select POOL_MEMBER.POOLMEM_SEQ as poolMemSeq, POOL_MEMBER.POOL_SEQ as poolSeq, POOL_MEMBER.USR_SEQ as usrSeq, POOL_MEMBER.APPROVE as approve, POOL_MEMBER.CRT_DATE as crtDate, USERS.USR_NICK as usrNick, USERS.USR_PROFILE as profile, USERS.USR_GENDER as gender from POOL_MEMBER, USERS WHERE POOL_MEMBER.USR_SEQ = USERS.USR_SEQ and POOL_MEMBER.POOL_SEQ = #{poolSeq }

select POOL_MEMBER.POOLMEM_SEQ as poolMemSeq, POOL_MEMBER.POOL_SEQ as poolSeq, POOL_MEMBER.USR_SEQ as usrSeq, POOL_MEMBER.APPROVE as approve, POOL_MEMBER.CRT_DATE as crtDate, USERS.USR_NICK as usrNick, USERS.USR_PROFILE as profile, USERS.USR_GENDER as gender, POOL_PARTY.POOL_PIC as poolPic, CONCAT(POOL_PARTY.POOL_NAME, IF(POOL_PARTY.FROM_DATE != "null" || POOL_PARTY.TO_DATE != "null",' ( ',''), IF(POOL_PARTY.FROM_DATE != "null", POOL_PARTY.FROM_DATE,''), IF(POOL_PARTY.TO_DATE != "null", CONCAT(' ~ ',POOL_PARTY.TO_DATE) ,''), IF(POOL_PARTY.FROM_DATE != "null" || POOL_PARTY.TO_DATE != "null",' )','')) as poolInfo from POOL_MEMBER, USERS, POOL_PARTY WHERE POOL_MEMBER.USR_SEQ = USERS.USR_SEQ AND POOL_MEMBER.POOL_SEQ = POOL_PARTY.POOL_SEQ AND POOL_MEMBER.APRV_USR = #{aprvUsr } AND POOL_MEMBER.APPROVE = 'N'
select count(*) from pool_party p, pool_member m where p.POOL_SEQ = m.POOL_SEQ and p.MANAGER_USR_SEQ <> m.USR_SEQ and m.approve = 'Y' and p.POOL_SEQ = #{poolSeq }
select count(*) from pool_member where USR_SEQ = #{usrSeq } and POOL_SEQ = #{poolSeq }
select POOL_SEQ as poolSeq, USR_SEQ as usrSeq from pool_member where usr_seq = #{usrSeq }
